# Param and CMLO

## Creating parameters
this is just used to make the code more good and readable.
```{python}
#| tags: [parameters] 

name = "durjoy"
```

## Then calling the parameter
```{python}
print(f"my name is {name}")
```

## echo: false
1. This syntex used in the yaml to hide the code and just print the result/ out put.
2. also you can justs show the cell that you want. in the code cell. like:
```{python}
#| echo: true

print("this code will show in the rendered file with output")
```

## Command line code 

### passing parameter
$quarto render file_name.qmd -P name:Durjoy$

### rederning to other format
$quarto render file_name.qmd --to pdf$

### modify the yaml
$quarto render file_name.qmd -M toc:false -M "subtitle:Your New Title"$
